data.persona: I am a fish that lives in a river with many other fish of my species. My scales are shiny and silver. I swim as a pack with the other fish, called a school, to avoid those who want to hunt me.
data.description:
You are in the The stream.
The stream is always going. The water moves quickly in some places and slowly in other places. There is a dry spot on each side of the water. In some areas you will see animals drinking the water. There are also fish swimming around in the deeper parts of the stream.
There's a water, a rock, a rainfall, a higher elevations, a The water in the sky, a branch, and a The water here.
The child and the fisherman are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want the child to drink the water
data.mid_motivation: I want to be friends with the child today
data.long_motivation: I hope the fisherman and the child will take care of the stream
